question:
Mrs Barrett, an English-speaking woman who lives in your town , has advertised for someone to help her in her home for a few hours a day next summer.

Write a letter to Mrs Barrett. In your letter
Suggest how you could help her in her home 
Say why you would like to do this work 
Explain when you will and will not be available
text: Hope you and your family are doing amazing. This letter is being written to you in response to your advertisement in the Australian Times newspaper seeking a helper for next summer.

There are a different  ways through which I can help you. Firstly, being a chef , I can help you in making appetizing cuisines for you and your family during the summer vacation. Moreover, I have good experience in cleaning also.

I am pursuing my  Master course studies at  the Royal University in Australia. I will get my summer vacation for four months. Apart from being a student, I have to take care of my daily expenses such as house rent, grocery shopping.
I will be available from May to August to do full-time work. After that, I have to prepare for my final exams . Please let me know whether these months are suitable for you or not.
I am waiting for your reply

error_list.error_des: The indefinite article a may not be required with the plural noun ways in this sentence. Consider removing the article, or changing the noun to singular.
